name: The Impossible Game (itch) (ackall2020)
description:
Want a challenge? Play The Impossible Game!

Collect coins and dodge blood-thirsty enemies and avoid spikes! Beat levels and move on! Do you have what it takes to complete all 8 levels?

Controls:

Right arrow key- move right

Left arrow key- move left

Up arrow key- move up

Down arrow key- move down
